Zero Trust Frameworks

Implement zero trust security architecture with continuous verification, least privilege access, and micro-segmentation.

Solution Overview

Verto Wave's Zero Trust Frameworks solution provides a modern and comprehensive approach to cybersecurity, shifting from a traditional perimeter-based defense to a proactive, identity-centric model. The core principle of Zero Trust is "never trust, always verify," meaning no user or device is trusted by default, whether inside or outside the network. Our solution helps you design and implement a Zero Trust architecture that protects your data, applications, and infrastructure by continuously verifying every access request. We help you reduce your attack surface, contain breaches, and achieve a more resilient security posture in today's complex and evolving threat landscape.

Key Features

Feature

Description

Micro-segmentation

Divide your network into small, isolated segments to prevent the lateral movement of attackers. This contains breaches and limits the impact of a security incident.

Strong Identity and Access Management (IAM)

Implement robust identity verification and access controls, including Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) and Single Sign-On (SSO), to ensure that only authorized users can access resources.

Endpoint Security

Secure all endpoints, including desktops, laptops, mobile devices, and IoT devices, with advanced threat detection and response capabilities.

Quantified Benefits

Reduce the Risk of Data Breaches by over 50%

By eliminating implicit trust and continuously verifying every access request, you can significantly reduce the likelihood and impact of a data breach.

Improve Security Posture and Resilience

A Zero Trust architecture makes your organization more resilient to cyberattacks by limiting the blast radius of a security incident.

Enable Secure Remote Work

Zero Trust provides a secure and seamless experience for your remote and hybrid workforce, allowing them to access the resources they need from anywhere, on any device.

Accelerate Cloud Adoption

A Zero Trust model provides the security foundation you need to confidently migrate your applications and data to the cloud.
